transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello ji, good afternoon.
Executive: Very good afternoon, sir.
Customer: Calling Gupta Ramayan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello ji, mam bataiye.
Customer: Calling Gupta baat kar rahi hu Ramayan ji se.
Executive: Ah, mai Ashraf baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke head office se.
Customer: Okay, mam ka bhi call aaya tha isi number pe.
Executive: Accha, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Ah, accha accha, mai ek baar check kara leta hu mam na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek call back arrange kara deta hu. Thik hai. Batana toh nahi.
Executive: Nahi, abhi toh nahi, ek baar check karana padega mam.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Hai na? Mai check kara ke batata hu. Thik hai.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to speak with Ramayan ji.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check and arrange a callback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, verification, contact
